mapper.select: SELECT st.TASK_ID, st.SUB_ID, st.TASK_NAME, st.DESCRIPTION, st.TEACHER_ID, u1.REAL_NAME AS TEACHER_NAME, st.STU_ID, u2.REAL_NAME AS STUDENT_NAME, st.STAGE, st.`STATUS`, st.START_TIME, st.END_TIME, str.RETRIES, str.SUMMARY, str.DOC_ID, str.FEEDBACK, str.`STATUS`, str.AUDIT_TIME, str.SCORE FROM stage_task st JOIN stage_task_result str ON ( st.TASK_ID = str.TASK_ID ) JOIN teacher t ON ( t.TEACHER_ID = st.TEACHER_ID ) JOIN USER u1 ON ( u1.USER_ID = t.USER_ID ) JOIN student s ON ( s.STU_ID = st.STU_ID ) JOIN USER u2 ON ( u2.USER_ID = s.USER_ID ) WHERE st.STU_ID = #{stuId}

SELECT st.TASK_ID, st.SUB_ID, st.TASK_NAME, st.DESCRIPTION, st.TEACHER_ID, u1.REAL_NAME AS TEACHER_NAME, st.STU_ID, u2.REAL_NAME AS STUDENT_NAME, st.STAGE, st.`STATUS`, st.START_TIME, st.END_TIME, str.RETRIES, str.SUMMARY, str.DOC_ID, str.FEEDBACK, str.`STATUS`, str.AUDIT_TIME, str.SCORE FROM stage_task st JOIN stage_task_result str ON ( st.TASK_ID = str.TASK_ID ) JOIN teacher t ON ( t.TEACHER_ID = st.TEACHER_ID ) JOIN USER u1 ON ( u1.USER_ID = t.USER_ID ) JOIN student s ON ( s.STU_ID = st.STU_ID ) JOIN USER u2 ON ( u2.USER_ID = s.USER_ID ) WHERE st.TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId}
